mods.abstract: Show 2, part 1 of the 1950 New Year's Eve special Grand Ole Opry show originating at the National Guard Armory, Washington, DC. Featuring Red Foley (host/performer), and performers Rod Brasfield, the Jordanaires, Grandpa Jones, and Minnie Pearl. Red Foley's band includes Grady Martin (guitar), Ernie Newton (bass), and a 19 year-old Billy Robinson (steel guitar).
